Author: lightblueheart
Text: She might know. It's hard to ask someone if they have an Eating Disorder. If she is struggling too she probably can tell. If you're afraid your influencing her you can put your diary on private. It's not your fault if she does pick up on your habits, ED's are competitive and triggering. Maybe you can stop counting/talking about counting in front of her and hide your MFP stuff. I've had to ask people to stop when I was recovering. I don't have advice on what to say to her, just some ways to trigger her less.
